Description: Simulates benthic habitat and/or growth of macrophytes such as seagrasses in specified sediment zones.
Simulates benthic macroalgal growth and sloughing/detachment of macroalgae and its subsequent redistribution within the domain.
A model of one or more groups of benthic filter feeders, able to assimilate C, N and P and recycle filter material back to the water column and sediment.
A high level module that returns habitat quality metrics based on underlying water condition attributes, for example, for seagrass or crab habitat suitability at different life stages.
